verses.text: God arises, \w his|strong="H1732"\w* enemies scatter: they who hate \w him|strong="H1732"\w* flee before \w him|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* smoke \w before|strong="H6440"\w* wind \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w driven|strong="H5127"\w*, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* wax melts \w before|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God vanish \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* righteous rejoice \w in|strong="H6440"\w* God’s \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w they|strong="H6440"\w* exult \w with|strong="H6440"\w* exceeding joy.

Sing \w to|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w make|strong="H8055"\w* music \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name, \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H6662"\+w*\nd*, praise \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* rides \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* clouds, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w exult|strong="H5970"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.
Father \w of|strong="H6440"\w* orphans, defender \w of|strong="H6440"\w* widows, \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* holy abode.

God brings home \w the|strong="H6944"\w* lonely, he leads forth \w the|strong="H6944"\w* prisoner \w to|strong="H6944"\w* comfort, so \w that|strong="H6944"\w* none but \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebel lives cheerless.

God, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* front \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* \w march|strong="H3318"\w* \w through|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* desert, \qs Selah\qs*

earth shook, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens poured rain \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, Sinai’s God \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*’s God.

Rain \w in|strong="H3478"\w* abundance, \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* sprinkle, restoring \w the|strong="H6440"\w* languishing \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* heritage.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* dwelling therein \w your|strong="H3559"\w* \w people|strong="H5159"\w* found: \w in|strong="H5159"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* goodness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w you|strong="H5159"\w* did care \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* \nd Lord\nd* spoke \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w glad|strong="H2896"\w* tidings \w of|strong="H3427"\w* victory, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* \w army|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* women proclaim \w it|strong="H3559"\w*:

‘Kings \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* flee, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* flee, \w and|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* housewife divides \w the|strong="H5414"\w* spoil:
dove’s wings covered \w with|strong="H1004"\w* silver \w and|strong="H4428"\w* pinions \w with|strong="H1004"\w* shimmer \w of|strong="H4428"\w* gold,
set \w with|strong="H7901"\w* stones, \w like|strong="H3701"\w* snow \w upon|strong="H7901"\w* Zalmon.’

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* peaks \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan.

\w You|strong="H2022"\w* high-peaked \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, why look \w you|strong="H2022"\w* askance \w at|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w which|strong="H2022"\w* God has desired \w for|strong="H2022"\w* his home whereon \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* live forever?

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* twice ten thousand: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sinai, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w place|strong="H7931"\w*.

You did mount \w the|strong="H6944"\w* height \w with|strong="H7393"\w* trains \w of|strong="H7393"\w* your captives, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w gifts|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H6944"\w* you \w had|strong="H6944"\w* received \w from|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* people. \w The|strong="H6944"\w* rebels \w shall|strong="H7393"\w* live \w with|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* \nd Lord\nd* God.

Blest be \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* who sustains \w us|strong="H5927"\w* daily, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* who \w is|strong="H4791"\w* also \w our|strong="H3947"\w* saviour. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Our|strong="H1288"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God who \w is|strong="H3117"\w* saviour. \w The|strong="H3117"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3117"\w* escape \w from|strong="H3117"\w* death \w are|strong="H3117"\w* known \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \nd Lord\nd* God.

Yes, \w God|strong="H3069"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* shatter \w the|strong="H3069"\w* head \w of|strong="H4194"\w* his foes \w the|strong="H3069"\w* rough scalp \w of|strong="H4194"\w* those who strut \w on|strong="H3069"\w* \w in|strong="H4194"\w* their sins.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* \nd Lord\nd* said: ‘\w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H1980"\w* home \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Bashan, home \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* depths \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sea,

\w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* feet \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* bathe \w in|strong="H7725"\w* blood, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* dogs lick \w their|strong="H7725"\w* share \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* foe.’

\w In|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* temple appear God’s triumphal processions, processions \w in|strong="H7272"\w* praise \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w king|strong="H4616"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* God,

\w with|strong="H4428"\w* singers \w in|strong="H4428"\w* front, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* minstrels behind, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* maidens \w with|strong="H4428"\w* timbrels between \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, singing,

‘\w You|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* well-spring \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Israel, bless \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \nd Lord\nd* God \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* dance.’

\w There|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* front, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* Benjamin \w the|strong="H3068"\w* little, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah beside \w them|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zebulon, princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Naphtali.
God, show \w your|strong="H8033"\w* strength, \w your|strong="H8033"\w* godlike might, \w as|strong="H3063"\w* you \w did|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* past,
\w from|strong="H6680"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* temple \w that|strong="H2098"\w* crowns Jerusalem. Kings \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* bring tribute \w to|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*.

Rebuke \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beast \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* reed, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* herd \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bulls, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* calves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples. Trample \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H4428"\w* lies. Scatter \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations whose \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* war.

\w May|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H2416"\w* Egypt \w with|strong="H5971"\w* gifts \w of|strong="H5971"\w* oil, Ethiopia haste \w with|strong="H5971"\w* full hands \w to|strong="H5971"\w* God.

Sing \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* kingdoms \w of|strong="H3027"\w* earth, \w make|strong="H3027"\w* melody \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \nd Lord\nd*. \qs Selah\qs*
\w Praise|strong="H2167"\w* him \w who|strong="H7891"\w* rides on \w the|strong="H2167"\w* ancient heavens. See! He utters \w his|strong="H7891"\w* voice, \w his|strong="H7891"\w* mighty voice.

\w Ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*, whose \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* majesty live \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* skies.

Awe-inspiring \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* holy \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w might|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* people. Blessed \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.
